page.title: 04DAILY LIFE IN BANCHORY - 2
page.content: Mrs. Davies gets up at 0740 each morning and comes to wake up her children. For breakfast she has half a grapefruit, a piece of toast and a cup of coffee. After her children have gone to school, she normally does some housework, or does something social such as bridge, tennis, squash, etc. For lunch, she has a snack such as a sandwich or soup and a biscuit. In the afternoon she will do the opposite of the morning. If she has done a social thing in the morning then she will do some housework in the afternoon. She has her tea of mince or curry or chops with vegetables, at about 1800. After tea she plays sport, tutors or watches television, or sometimes she takes the dog for a walk. At about 2330, she goes to her bed.
